short.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Now you can play Christmas Santa Mission Unblocked right on Chrome™ Browser! Offline and Popup Version, without internet required!
short.am: Play Christmas Santa Mission Unblocked right on Chrome™ Browser! Offline and Popup Version!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Help Santa get his gifts ready for Christmas! This is Christmas games for kids online. Each level brings a list of different items to collect like Santa hats, candy canes and gifts. Match three or more of each gift to get the required number of each and make it to the next level. But be quick and get them all before your time runs out! 

How to play:
mouse, fingers

*Note:We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://retrobowlunblocked.org/
